metadata.title: CVE-2025-0237 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The WebChannel API, which is used to transport various information acrossprocesses, did not check the sending principal but rather accepted theprincipal being sent. This could have led to privilege escalation attacks.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 134, Firefox ESR < 128.6, Thunderbird< 134, and Thunderbird < 128.6.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
